attributes.name: Burning Passion
attributes.description: "The things you do for love."
attributes.parsed_description: "The things you do for love."

attributes.name: Burning Rage
attributes.description: "The fires of hatred consumed her heart, and the whole world felt her fury."
attributes.parsed_description: "The fires of hatred consumed her heart, and the whole world felt her fury."

attributes.name: Burning Void
attributes.description: "Do not let the darkness fool you. The void burns all the same."
attributes.parsed_description: "Do not let the darkness fool you. The void burns all the same."

attributes.name: Burning Voidtendril
attributes.description: "The void burns all that it touches as it corrupts the weak of heart."
attributes.parsed_description: "The void burns all that it touches as it corrupts the weak of heart."

attributes.name: Calamity
attributes.description: "Sow chaos, death, destruction. Make them pay."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sow chaos, death, destruction. Make them pay."

attributes.name: Calcified Cleaver
attributes.description: "Eons of sediment has built up to hide the true nature of this axe. What remains is a razor sharpe edge that is sure to leave an infection alongside a wound."
attributes.parsed_description: "Eons of sediment has built up to hide the true nature of this axe. What remains is a razor sharpe edge that is sure to leave an infection alongside a wound."

attributes.name: Callous Javelin
attributes.description: "Throw me and see where I land."
attributes.parsed_description: "Throw me and see where I land."

attributes.name: Calm of Cael
attributes.description: "The great shaman Cael maintained such a calm even in the midst of battle that he was able to defeat nearly all who sought to do him harm."
attributes.parsed_description: "The great shaman Cael maintained such a calm even in the midst of battle that he was able to defeat nearly all who sought to do him harm."

attributes.name: Cannibal's Hammer
attributes.description: "A doctor was found to have eaten many of his patients, first knocking them out with his hammer before feasting on their corpses."
attributes.parsed_description: "A doctor was found to have eaten many of his patients, first knocking them out with his hammer before feasting on their corpses."

attributes.name: Cannoneer
attributes.description: “Wood can be sharpened to such a fine point that it is as effective as steel.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Wood can be sharpened to such a fine point that it is as effective as steel.”

attributes.name: Cannonlighter
attributes.description: "Light the fuse and let our enemies feel our wrath!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Light the fuse and let our enemies feel our wrath!"

attributes.name: Captain Patricia's Rifle
attributes.description: "Captain Patricia once held the record for most consecutive shots hit from the prow of a sailing ship. She held that record with this rifle."
attributes.parsed_description: "Captain Patricia once held the record for most consecutive shots hit from the prow of a sailing ship. She held that record with this rifle."

attributes.name: Captain's Call
attributes.description: "All hands on deck!"
attributes.parsed_description: "All hands on deck!"

attributes.name: Captain's Command
attributes.description: "With a single stroke of the sword, Captain Hamidou laid rest to all arguments against their command."
attributes.parsed_description: "With a single stroke of the sword, Captain Hamidou laid rest to all arguments against their command."

attributes.name: Captain's Fury
attributes.description: "Any soul foolish enough to question the Captain quickly found themselves marooned... or worse."
attributes.parsed_description: "Any soul foolish enough to question the Captain quickly found themselves marooned... or worse."

attributes.name: Captain's Longshot
attributes.description: "The captain never misses a shot."
attributes.parsed_description: "The captain never misses a shot."

attributes.name: Captain's Perogative
attributes.description: "It is the captain's right to take what they desire from those who are against them."
attributes.parsed_description: "It is the captain's right to take what they desire from those who are against them."

attributes.name: Captain's Prerogative
attributes.description: "It is the captain's right to take what they desire from those who are against them."
attributes.parsed_description: "It is the captain's right to take what they desire from those who are against them."

attributes.name: Caputah, Gaze of Serpens
attributes.description: “Alone, enraged, and afraid it wandered the halls following the scent of arcane power."
attributes.parsed_description: “Alone, enraged, and afraid it wandered the halls following the scent of arcane power."

attributes.name: Cardinal Sin
attributes.description: "When the Ancients first awoke the Azoth, they brought forth a power they could not understand."
attributes.parsed_description: "When the Ancients first awoke the Azoth, they brought forth a power they could not understand."

attributes.name: Caudanthe, Fang of Serpens
attributes.description: “The monster lashed out, striking its creators down with a single blow.”
attributes.parsed_description: “The monster lashed out, striking its creators down with a single blow.”

attributes.name: Cauterization
attributes.description: "Fire will purify your wound."
attributes.parsed_description: "Fire will purify your wound."

attributes.name: Cauterizer
attributes.description: "Not a drop of blood lost."
attributes.parsed_description: "Not a drop of blood lost."

attributes.name: Cauterizing Hatchet
attributes.description: "It's not sterile, and it just may kill you. But in a pinch this hatchet will close any wound that it already opened."
attributes.parsed_description: "It's not sterile, and it just may kill you. But in a pinch this hatchet will close any wound that it already opened."

attributes.name: Cavern Lurker's Defense
attributes.description: "Light is a rare commodity deep in the caves. One must be ready to defend themselves."
attributes.parsed_description: "Light is a rare commodity deep in the caves. One must be ready to defend themselves."

attributes.name: Censure
attributes.description: "For your punishment you shall receive three strikes of my hatchet. Should you survive, you shall receive three more."
attributes.parsed_description: "For your punishment you shall receive three strikes of my hatchet. Should you survive, you shall receive three more."

attributes.name: Ceremonial Cleaver
attributes.description: "Syndicate archaeologists suspect this axe was used for Ancient rituals. What those rituals were is still unknown."
attributes.parsed_description: "Syndicate archaeologists suspect this axe was used for Ancient rituals. What those rituals were is still unknown."

attributes.name: Ceremonial Darkstaff
attributes.description: "A runic shaft coated with dark ash, this weapon is hauntingly beautiful."
attributes.parsed_description: "A runic shaft coated with dark ash, this weapon is hauntingly beautiful."

attributes.name: Ceremonial Defenses
attributes.description: "These Ceremonial Defenses provide far more than just a show of protection."
attributes.parsed_description: "These Ceremonial Defenses provide far more than just a show of protection."

attributes.name: Ceremonial Defenses
attributes.description: "These Ceremonial Defenses provide far more than just a show of protection."
attributes.parsed_description: "These Ceremonial Defenses provide far more than just a show of protection."

attributes.name: Ceremonial Ranseur of Sacrifice
attributes.description: "Far more than a ceremonial weapon, this ranseur was honed sharp and used often."
attributes.parsed_description: "Far more than a ceremonial weapon, this ranseur was honed sharp and used often."

attributes.name: Chained Darkness
attributes.description: "Keep the darkness at bay."
attributes.parsed_description: "Keep the darkness at bay."

attributes.name: Changeling's Rapier
attributes.description: "What form I take is of no concern to you."
attributes.parsed_description: "What form I take is of no concern to you."

attributes.name: Channeler's Fire Staff
attributes.description: Channeler's Fire Staff
attributes.parsed_description: Channeler's Fire Staff

attributes.name: Chaos Spear
attributes.description: "Every strike causes confusion. Every use leads to upheaval."
attributes.parsed_description: "Every strike causes confusion. Every use leads to upheaval."

attributes.name: Charblade
attributes.description: "Dipped in the fiery heart of Vesuvius."
attributes.parsed_description: "Dipped in the fiery heart of Vesuvius."

attributes.name: Charge of the Empress
attributes.description: "My royal subjects, I ask that you assist me in the conquest of this land in the name of the Tempest."
attributes.parsed_description: "My royal subjects, I ask that you assist me in the conquest of this land in the name of the Tempest."

attributes.name: Charred Waraxe
attributes.description: "Fight through the fire and come out the other side."
attributes.parsed_description: "Fight through the fire and come out the other side."

attributes.name: Cherished Memory
attributes.description: "No matter what may happen between us, I will remember you fondly."
attributes.parsed_description: "No matter what may happen between us, I will remember you fondly."

attributes.name: Chilling Reception
attributes.description: "Greetings from the world of souls, you're quite welcome to stay. Leaving, on the other hand..."
attributes.parsed_description: "Greetings from the world of souls, you're quite welcome to stay. Leaving, on the other hand..."
